setup.description: This is the description WiseML file of the UzL testbed in Luebeck, Germany containing 54 iSense, 54 telosB and 54 Pacemate sensor nodes.

node.description: Processor: MSP 430F1611 (Ram 10kB, Flash 48kB, op/sleep 22mA, 5myA) Radio: TI CC2420 IEEE 802.15.4(2,4 GHz)
Processor: Jennic JN5148 (128kB RAM, 512kB Flash, 32 Bit RISC Controller, 4-32MHz) Radio: IEEE 802.15.4 compliant radio, 250kbit/s, hardware AES encryption, ToF ranging engine)
